title: Carlos Ramirez from No Echo (Buried Treasure Episode - Powerviolence)
itunes:title: Carlos Ramirez from No Echo (Buried Treasure Episode - Powerviolence)
description:
Episode 297 - BURIED TREASURE EPISODE ALERT! I have my friend Carlos Ramirez from the site No Echo over to discuss our love for the music genre known as POWERVIOLENCE. We dig deep into bands that we feel may be slightly overlooked and talk about why they are important to us. We also discuss interviewing tactics and why we both love context. Enjoy the deep dive and hopefully you find a new band or two that you can revisit. Bands discussed: Guyver One Acrid Assuck Monster X C.R. S.O.B. Let me buy you dinner and get $30 off your first order with Hello Fresh. I love their meals and you will too. Use promo code WORDS30. Get 15% off by using the code PCJABBERJAW. Visit Rockabillia.com and find it ALL! URM Academy is the best online school for anything production related! You must try it out! Use our Amazon Affiliate Code to support the show! Visit our friends over at No Echo for great features on punk, hardcore and all things heavy.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
